attributes.review:
The moment I opened this app I was immediately disgusted. I saw a Cheeto orange looking guy. He could‚Äôve been my sleep paralysis demon but that‚Äôs besides the point. He looked like this one guy I saw on a meme once. I‚Äôm trying to remember...oh yeah it was a meme of Nicki Minaj and she was yelling ‚ÄúSTUPID F*CKING DINOSAUR GET THE F*CK OUTTA HERE‚Äù.

 he was the dinosaur. 

I also noticed him holding his fist up. It reminded me of the time Logan Paul said ‚Äú‚úäüèª‚úä‚úäüèº‚úäüèΩ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèø‚Äù and I was like ‚Äúwho has a yellow skin tone?‚Äù Really he was just looking out for trump. Glad to see he supports the BLM movement.

*me silently hoping that will trigger him

I‚Äôm boreddddd anyway

He wants to take tik tok? welp. We‚Äôre going to take whatever this stupid app is for.
attributes.title: Stupid dinosaur

attributes.review: I‚Äôm not part of the ‚ÄúGen Z‚Äù thing that is going on. I genuinely got the app to get to know what the future holds for America but I couldn‚Äôt get passed the first screen. I tried and tried and tried to put my phone number in to simply get the verification code but it keeps rejecting me. Like it wouldn‚Äôt even accept my phone number even after I refreshed the screen. So I tried turning my phone on and off, kind of like resetting it, but it still didn‚Äôt work. At this point I was close to giving but I persisted. I eventually came to the conclusion that it was just my phone so I bought a new cell phone and downloaded the app again but the same error occurred. I then scrolled through all reviews for this app to see if anyone else was having the same problem or had any tips. After reading all the 100k+ 1 star reviews, I finally found a review saying their WiFi was the problem (wireless internet for any boomers out there that doesn‚Äôt know what that means). I originally was going to buy a new internet booster but I didn‚Äôt want to risk it not working so instead I flew out to the closest Trump Hotel to connect my phone to their network. After all that effort, I tried loading the app one last time, then during the loading screen it told me to ‚Äúgo back to my country.‚Äù
attributes.title: Where did I go wrong?

MY GRANDMA IS GONEüò≠. and on top of this i got a notification from maps that i was being tracked. keep in mind the the only app i have on my phone now is this STUPid APP. TRUMP IS STEALING OUR INFO AND TRACKING US!! and yet he wants to take away the one app that makes us happy, just because he has beef with china. AND YET HES STEALING OUR INFO NOT THEM. where‚Äôs john f kennedy when you need himüòî trump stole my grandma.
